text: The Holy Land is an area in the Levant that is holy to Abrahamic religions (Christianity, Islam and Judaism). The name roughly refers to the region of Palestine. Jews say God gave the Holy Land to them. This is where Jesus lived. James, along with the others named "brothers" of Jesus, are said to have been Jesus' cousins. Several Crusades were fought there. ==Other websites== *"Description of the Holy Land" is an old map from the 1500s which shows the Holy Land when Jesus was alive Category:Regions of Asia Category:Religious places Category:Jewish history Category:History of Islam Category:Bible Category:History of Israel Category:History of Palestine Category:Crusades Category:Middle East
title: Holy Land
